short_summary: Single highway truck tractor for Parks Canada
description: See attachment P-2 (pp. 1 - 6) for detailed requirements.
full_summary:
=====================

Highway Tractor - Request for Proposal
--------------------------------*****
### Invitation to Tender

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is requesting proposals from suppliers for the supply and delivery of one (1) Highway Tractor to Jasper, Alberta.

### Details of Requirement

*   Natural Goods Service Code (UNSPSC): 25102100 - **Truck tractors**
*   Region of delivery: Alberta, Canada
*   Expected end user agency: Parks Canada Agency
*   Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Scope of Work

The contractor is required to supply and deliver one (1) Highway Tractor to the end-user agency in Jasper, Alberta by no later than March 30, 2024.

### Tender Submission

Please disregard the previously posted closing time on Ariba Discovery and CanadaBuys. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2023-04-25 at 2:00 PM EDT. Any bid submitted after 2:00 PM EDT on this date will be declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information

For any inquiries or clarification, please contact:

Wall, Ruwani (SPAC/PSPC)
ruwani.wall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice Information

*   Solicitation number: WS3733873958
*   Amendment number: 4
*   Publication date: 2023-03-02
*   Closing date: 2023-04-25
*   Attachment: Not applicable
*   Trade Exhibit statute: N/A
*   Essential Requirements for the description: As per tender description.

*   Notice URL: 
 [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15578403?extsite=MTU1Nzg0MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15578403?extsite=MTU1Nzg0MDNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Language

English and French. Please refer to the terms and conditions for further details.  [1](https://
